version.author: sinfricia
version.changelog: Updated ReaPack Header to hopefully include images.

version.author: sinfricia
version.changelog: Updated ReaPack Header to hopefully include images.

version.author: sinfricia
version.changelog: Fixed bug where clearing album entries would clear all data.

version.author: sinfricia
version.changelog: - Reworked pregap creation system. Pregap can now be specified per track. - Added additional warnings if tracks or markers don't conform with the CD Red Book standard. - On startup the script can now automatically set all necessary grid settings to ensure CD Red Book conformity. - Markers are now always placed on the grid. - Many, many bugfixes and improvments.

version.author: sinfricia
version.changelog: - Updated tooltips - Improved pregap field apperance - Changed album marker number to 900 for better compatibility with ReaClassical

version.author: sinfricia
version.changelog: - Reworked tooltips apperance - Improved tooltips content - Added version number to UI - Added error checking for language field - Improved error checking for people fields - Script window now scales properly on UI scale change - Added keyboard shortcut (ctrl + up/down arrow) to scale UI - Fixed various crashes and bugs

reapack.name: SiSt_Mastering Setup.lua
reapack.desc: Mastering setup (space items ans create regions)

version.author: sinfricia
version.changelog: v1.1 (2022-07-29): - Fixed typo in 'performer' field - metadata markers now start at index 101, pregap markers at 501
